I am Ilias Miraoui and I like to build things


I grew up between France, Morocco and the United States.

I graduated from a dual Bachelor of Arts between Sciences Po and Columbia University, majoring in Economics at Sciences Po and in Financial Economics with a concentration in Business Management at Columbia.

Passionate about Tech and Finance, I previously worked in Investment Banking at TD Securities for two years. After a few rotations on the trading floor, I worked for a year and a half in Debt Capital Markets. As an analyst on the Corporate origination team, I helped advise our investment grade corporate clients on accessing the global public & private debt capital markets and on managing their capital structure more generally.

I am currently looking for opportunities in Tech and Finance.


Graduate Student at UC Berkeley
Master of Engineering in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research

Projects

  • Analyzing Sanitary Conditions in Restaurants in New York City
